data.title: Generally speaking, Black frieza vs Broly who is stronger?
data.meta_description: This is literally the only Sub where  People doubt if black Freeza is stronger than brolly or not , I want to see people opinions on it
data.text:
I think it doesn't work narrative and feat wise, Freeza Got the best feats so Far in the story and narrative wise Goku doesn't believe all 3 of them are cable of defeating Freeza

And that ofcours ignoring Galactic patrol arc and Granolah arc

The fuck you mean all 3 of them?

Raw PL is now portrayed as being only one aspect of what makes a good fighter and the mental element is a huge component. Goku has been regressed to being a novice who’s too stupid to figure out that he needs to do more than just beef up his muscles if he wants his power to reach new heights.

Frieza has trained for a decade and seemingly figured out some stuff Vegeta and Goku haven’t.

The narration works, even if it’s rife with stupidity.

The fuck you mean all 3 of them?

Raw PL is now portrayed as being only one aspect of what makes a good fighter and the mental element is a huge component. Goku has been regressed to being a novice who’s too stupid to figure out that he needs to do more than just beef up his muscles if he wants his power to reach new heights.

Frieza has trained for a decade and seemingly figured out some stuff Vegeta and Goku haven’t.

The narration works, even if it’s rife with stupidity.

By narrative I mean Freeza being matched in a 1on1 by anyone right now (doesn't matter if it was Hax or fighting skills)

And honestly I hated the "novice Goku" part because didn't Goku pull the same thing vegeta aim for against Ginya ?

Moro and later Gas are said to be the highest ki Goku ever felt.

So doesn't that mean they were stronger than LSSJ Broly?

I tried to headcannon Broly being surpassed was just his Base and not his highest form. (Assuming he couldn't jump to it at will.)

But narratively, I have to concede that was never stated.

If Moro and Gas are the highest Ki's Goku ever felt, then Broly has already been surpassed.

Black Frieza by extension, is above them all.

They're probably comparable. Impossible to say for sure who is stronger.

But I'm going to go with Freeza if Moro at his best is actually superior to FP-SSJ Broly.

Manga Scaling:

Tier 0

Whis

Tier 1

MSSJB Gogeta/Vegetto

Tier 2

Gohan Beast, Freeza Black, Beerus

Tier 3

Gas, UI Goku, UE Vegeta, Granolah, Moro-73, FP-SSJ Broly

Tier 4

Cell Max

Tier 5

Jiren & Orange Piccolo

Moro is not stronger than Broly.

Please can you provide the evidence for this. I'm interested in seeing it.

Goku claims Moro was his toughest opponent yet. But it’s not a PL statement. He meant difficult to fight, just like Majin Buu was due to how pesky handling him was.

My bad I meant Super Saiyan

Hard to see.

We know in the movie that SSJ Gogeta outperformed SSJB Goku. In the Mangaverse that'd be MSSJB Goku.

The Gamma's are said to be comparable to Goku & Vegeta, but I think they were compared to their Moro Arc MSSJB selves, as opposed UI-Omen Goku & SSJBE Vegeta. I'd say Orange Piccolo is comparable to Moro Arc UI-Omen Goku & SSJBE Vegeta.

So current SSJ Gogeta/Vegetto would probably be around as strong as Orange Piccolo & Jiren if not a bit stronger. But I couldn't see him beating Cell Max without going higher than SSJ.

To be honest I'm not positive though.

Broly is the benchmark by Toriyama

Broly is comparable to Beerus

Black Freeza got called weaker than Beerus by V-Jump

Broly still is stronger at the moment unless stated otherwise.

Before people say "But Goku is hiding Broly from Freeza!", he was doing the same thing in the movie timeline, where Freeza doesn't have anything above Golden. He's hiding Broly from Freeza because Freeza can manipulate him and use him against the universe. I thought Black Freeza was stronger but they still put him below Beerus while Broly is put on his level. So we'll see. I hope he's stronger though, can't be a decent threat if this caveman can handle you if he gets mad enough.

Broly is the benchmark by Toriyama

Brenchmark by one of the no-name staff which Toyataro didn't agree on.

Broly is comparable to Beerus

According to Goku who doesn't know Beerus's full power, and the same Goku proceed to claim Moro is stronger than anyone he has ever fought before from the following saga.

Black Freeza got called weaker than Beerus by V-Jump

The same Frieza who one-shotted the strongest mortal in Universe 7, ask yourself this question if Broly is a mortal or not.

Broly still is stronger at the moment unless stated otherwise.

Toronbo to Granolah: So your wish is to become the strongest mortal aside from Gods themselves?

Before people say "But Goku is hiding Broly from Freeza!", he was doing the same thing in the movie timeline, where Freeza doesn't have anything above Golden. He's hiding Broly from Freeza because Freeza can manipulate him and use him against the universe. I thought Black Freeza was stronger but they still put him below Beerus while Broly is put on his level. So we'll see. I hope he's stronger though, can't be a decent threat if this caveman can handle you if he gets mad enough.

Meanwhile Broly in the same movie/saga is stated weaker than Cell Max according to WOG, the same Cell Max who couldn't make Gohan Beast flinch with his punch.

Before people say "But Goku is hiding Broly from Freeza!", he was doing the same thing in the movie timeline, where Freeza doesn't have anything above Golden. He's hiding Broly from Freeza because Freeza can manipulate him and use him against the universe.

Wasn't that always obvious lol?

Goku and Vegeta can't even readily rely on Broly to aid them if they have to face Black Frieza. He's as likely to attack them as he's to attack Frieza if he snaps. Frieza is perfectly aware of this and cunning enough to just go get Broly and somehow convince him that he should get revenge for Paragus because Goku and Vegeta killed him even though they did not.
